description: High-level health overview of PMM-HA components: PostgreSQL/Patroni, ClickHouse, VictoriaMetrics, HAProxy

panels.description: Click row below to see PMM pod details

targets.expr:
(
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"${release}-${pmm_suffix_regex}"}) == 1)
  ==
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_info{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"${release}-${pmm_suffix_regex}"}))
  and
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_info{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"${release}-${pmm_suffix_regex}"})) > 0
) * 0 + 1 or vector(0)

panels.title: üß≠ PMM

panels.description: Click row below to see PostgreSQL pod details

targets.expr:
(
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"${release}-pg-db-.*", exported_pod!~".*(${pg_exclude_regex}).*"}) == 1)
  ==
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_info{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"${release}-pg-db-.*", exported_pod!~".*(${pg_exclude_regex}).*"}))
  and
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_info{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"${release}-pg-db-.*", exported_pod!~".*(${pg_exclude_regex}).*"})) > 0
) * 0 + 1 or vector(0)

panels.title: üêò PostgreSQL

panels.description: Click row below to see ClickHouse pod details

targets.expr:
(
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"${release}-${clickhouse_suffix_regex}"}) == 1)
  ==
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_info{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"${release}-${clickhouse_suffix_regex}"}))
  and
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_info{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"${release}-${clickhouse_suffix_regex}"})) > 0

panels.description: Click row below to see VictoriaMetrics pod details

targets.expr:
(
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"${vm_suffix_regex}.*${release}.*"}) == 1)
  ==
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_info{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"${vm_suffix_regex}.*${release}.*"}))
  and
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_info{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"${vm_suffix_regex}.*${release}.*"})) > 0
) * 0 + 1 or vector(0)

panels.title: üìä VictoriaMetrics

panels.description: Click row below to see HAProxy pod details

targets.expr:
(
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$haproxy_pod_regex"}) == 1)
  ==
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_info{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$haproxy_pod_regex"}))
  and
  count(max by(exported_pod) (kube_pod_info{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"$haproxy_pod_regex"})) > 0
) * 0 + 1 or vector(0)

panels.description: Status of each ClickHouse pod with leader/follower role.

targets.expr: label_replace(max by(instance) (ClickHouseAsyncMetrics_KeeperIsLeader), "pod_ip", "$1", "instance", "([0-9.]+):.*") * on(pod_ip) group_left(exported_pod) max by(pod_ip, exported_pod) (kube_pod_info{exported_namespace="$namespace", exported_pod=~"${release}-${clickhouse_suffix_regex}"})
